spell.name: Pisces
spell.combatDescription: * Place a Magician on Pisces. * Search your deck for a card (Clever: 2 cards), place it in your hand, and then shuffle the deck. * You may move any or all Adversaries in the combat to your current Zone. * Deal 5 Damage to any Adversary so moved. * If they had Flying, they no longer have Flying. * At the end of the turn, discard The Magician.
spell.skillDescription: * Any time you want, throw a spectral grappling hook. * This can be used to grab distant things or to set up difficult climbs.
spell.flavor: The fish can be elusive, which is why you need a good hook.
